ComicInfo.Title: Bugcat Rising; Bugcat Bites
ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s the 2nd Anniversary issue! Catbug is evil! There is no other way around it, there is definitely something wrong with the little guy and it’s up to the Bravest Warriors to figure out what it is before it’s too late…or maybe it’s too soon? Crazy things are happening but it’s just getting started for this crew of teens.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ian McGinty | 1 | B | Cover B | Maris Wicks | 2 | C | Cover C | Chip Zdarsky | 3 | RE | New York Comic Con Exclusive Cover | Kate Leth | Missing | RE | BOOM! Studios Exclusive Cover | Paulina Ganucheau | Missing |
